body:
Hello,

As you know, the Staff Applications were due to open in about 2 weeks. However the Sr Staff and I have decided to postpone them until further notice. This is due to some recent issues that have come up. But, do not worry because we will definitely bring out the applications again soon! I will keep you posted on when the applications are soon to be opened to give you time to prepare your app. If you have any questions feel free to ask around on the forums, contact one of the staff members keep yourself on active in order to check for the guidelines soon to be released.

Sorry for the inconvenience

Telitroubleton
